addr: 1300 North Wilton Place Los Angeles, CA 90028
title: Cold Reading Class - Night
desc: Must be a current & eligible TCD member. If you haven't been to class before, you MUST call the office before attending. Sides are posted on the calendar. Must bring with as we do not print sides. Help us save trees!? Need to brush up on your cold reading skills? A diligent actor practices out loud and in front of others so they?re more relaxed and polished. Holding onto sides is a crutch and takes away from important aspects of your performance, including body language. Actors will have a much better understanding of why being off book without the paper is important. It allows you to quit worrying about your lines and focus on just being yourself in a scene. By the end of class, you?ll be off book and more confident:). You?ll get an awesome workout! Must be on time and present for the entire class. Check out our production reel!? & Meet the? TCD team!
